work:Film.Title: And Now for Something Completely Different
work:Film.Description: A collection of sketches from the first and second TV series of Monty Python's Flying Circus purposely re-enacted and shot for film.

work:Film.Title: Monty Python and the Holy Grail
work:Film.Description: King Arthur and his knights embark on a low-budget search for the Holy Grail, encountering humorous obstacles along the way. Some of these turned into standalone sketches.

work:Film.Title: Monty Python's Life of Brian
work:Film.Description: Brian is born on the first Christmas, in the stable next to Jesus'. He spends his life being mistaken for a messiah.

work:Film.Title: Monty Python Live at the Hollywood Bowl
work:Film.Description: A videotape recording directed by Ian MacNaughton of a live performance of sketches. Originally intended for a TV/video special. Transferred to 35mm and given a limited theatrical release in the US.

work:Film.Title: Monty Python's The Meaning of Life
work:Film.Description: An examination of the meaning of life in a series of sketches from conception to death and beyond.

work:Film.Title: Monty Python: Almost the Truth (The Lawyer's Cut)
work:Film.Description: This film features interviews with all the surviving Python members, along with archive representation for the late Graham Chapman.

work:Film.Title: A Liar's Autobiography: Volume IV
work:Film.Description: This is an animated film which is based on the memoir of the late Monty Python member, Graham Chapman.
